title: All 32 - Houston Texans: What Bill O'Brien's trade of DeAndre Hopkins means for Deshaun Watson with Steph Stradley (Football 6/17)
description:
'All 32' powers on as guest host Ryan Wilson welcomes Steph Stradley of the Houston Chronicle to chat about the Texans. Of course, Bill O'Brien is heavily discussed with a focus on his offseason trade of DeAndre Hopkins and the effects that move could have on Deshaun Watson and the offense (1:15). Will J.J. Watt retire a Texan (11:45)? Will BOB lead his team back to the playoffs (18:00)? All that and more included on this episode.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @ryanwilsonCBS, @StephStradley
Subscribe to our Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw

itunes:title: All 32 - Houston Texans: What Bill O'Brien's trade of DeAndre Hopkins means for Deshaun Watson with Steph Stradley (Football 6/17)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: The Texans don't have DeAndre Hopkins anymore, but they do still have Deshaun Watson and that can lead them a long way. Steph Stradley of the Houston Chronicle breaks down the team.
